pages.text: The Crimson Mosquito is a very big fliying hostile creature that likes to suck the blood of their preys.$(br2)If a Crimson Mosquito sucks the blood of a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/mungus)Mungus$(/l), and the Mungus has been covered competely in Warped Fungus, the Crimson Mosquito will transform into a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/warped_mosco)Warped Mosco$(/l).
Don't try to burn them, they're fire resistant!
Crimson Mosquito may be drop a Blood Sac or Crimson Mosquito Proboscis on death.$(br2)Those items may be used to craft a powerfull range weapon $(l:patchouli:weapons/blood_sprayer)Blood Sprayer$(/l).
